Avoid reading and seeing things which will suggest impure thoughts. Cultivate the moral and intellectual powers. Let not 
                                                                           10
these noble powers become enfeebled and perverted by much reading of even story books. I know of strong minds that have been unbalanced and partially benumbed, or paralyzed, by intemperance in reading. --Testimonies, Vol. II, p. 410.
